title: Five-Star City Break with Club Access
description: Stay in the heart of Cebu and discover all this Philippine city has to offer with a five-star stay at Radisson Blu Cebu - rated #1 in Cebu on TripAdvisor. Enjoy as a self-contained holiday or as a launchpad for island-hopping around the Philippines, and receive VIP treatment with a welcome cocktail and daily access to the hotel’s Club Lounge included in your escape. As a Club guest, you’ll enjoy breakfast in the Lounge every morning, plus afternoon snacks, nightly cocktails and canapés and all-day non-alcoholic refreshments. Extend your stay to five or seven nights and you’ll also receive a complimentary room upgrade.
offer_address: Serging Osmena Boulevard, Corner Pope John Paul II Ave, Cebu City, 6000, Philippines
